entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arctic Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.3°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 37.
